title: Help Id this font, PLEASE!
content:
Hi everybody, I'm working on an Advertising campaing and I really need to know what's the type used on the logo brand!

Please some body help me!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [IMG\_doriana.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20110320032945/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_doriana.jpg) | 158.47 KB |
author: Pedro Henrique Gomes

comments.content:
It's probably custom, but it is similar to [Tartine Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20110320032945/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/tartine-script/) from FontFont, by Xavier Dupré.

- Mike Yanega
Another possibility would be Textile aka Lucida Big Casual …

Thaks very much,  
you guys saved my life today!

Pedro Henrique

Pedro:

It's Club Type Mercurius™ Medium Italic, the "i" character was somehow edited, and the whole word was inclined...

Q™ Says: It's All About The Fonts!
